definition: Haeinsa in South Gyeongsang province of South Korea, the repository of Tripitaka Koreana 高麗大藏經|高丽大藏经[Gao1 li2 da4 zang4 jing1], a World Heritage site
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
